name: Maine Crisis Line
description: The Maine Crisis Line is staffed 24/7 by clinically trained crisis workers who provide crisis intervention support by telephone, text, and chat. They can connect individuals with community resources and referrals. They also support non-English speakers through telephonic interpreting services
services: Armenian-speaking Crisis intervention in Maine consultation

name: Sweetser
description: Sweetser's Mobile Crisis Services operate 24/7 and serve adults and families. They aim to stabilize individuals, assist in crisis resolution, and provide a crisis plan. They can connect individuals with services and support
services: Armenian-speaking Crisis intervention in Maine consultation

name: Aroostook Mental Health Services (AMHC)
description: AMHC offers 24/7 crisis services across Aroostook, Hancock, and Washington counties, available at home, in the community, and via telehealth. They provide mental health and substance use assessments, safety planning, and referrals
services: Armenian-speaking Crisis intervention in Maine consultation

name: The Opportunity Alliance (TOA)
description: The Maine Crisis Line, operated by The Opportunity Alliance, provides 24/7 crisis support via call, text, or chat. They offer confidential support and can connect individuals with local Mobile Crisis response teams. They also support non-English speakers
services: Armenian-speaking Crisis intervention in Maine consultation

name: Crisis & Counseling Centers
description: This organization serves Somerset and Kennebec Counties and offers crisis intervention services. They are part of the broader Maine crisis response system
services: Armenian-speaking Crisis intervention in Maine consultation

name: MaineHealth Behavioral Health
description: MaineHealth Behavioral Health offers a range of counseling and therapy services, including crisis management. They have interpreters available for clients who speak languages not represented by their staff
services: Armenian-speaking Crisis intervention in Maine consultation

name: Northern Light Behavioral Health
description: Northern Light Behavioral Health provides various behavioral health services, including crisis counseling therapy, for children, adolescents, and adults
services: Armenian-speaking Crisis intervention in Maine consultation

name: NAMI Maine
description: NAMI Maine offers support, education, and advocacy. They can help navigate the system and connect individuals to resources and ongoing support. They also provide information on crisis resources
services: Armenian-speaking Crisis intervention in Maine consultation

name: Gateway Community Services
description: Provides case management and counseling for immigrants. While not exclusively a crisis intervention service, they may be able to assist or refer individuals who are immigrants
services: Armenian-speaking Crisis intervention in Maine consultation

name: Maine Immigrant and Refugee Services (MEIRS)
description: Offers case management and mental health services to people with insurance, including immigrants and refugees. They may be able to provide or direct individuals to appropriate support
services: Armenian-speaking Crisis intervention in Maine consultation
